resources.string: Now you can switch on/off the water pump, by pressing the green/red button !
Welcome to this application !\nYou have to follow just a few steps to setup the wet plant system !
1) Install the software on Arduino\n2) Setup the Arduino\'s IP in the settings
The host/IP you have set is not correct, please correct it !
Please check your WiFi or 3G connection
The water pump has been stopped !
The host is not alive, please check it
Insert the IP of your device
